statements: SELECT species, population_size FROM FishPopulationHealth WHERE health_status = 'healthy';
SELECT * FROM FishPopulationHealth WHERE population_size > 10000 ORDER BY average_weight DESC;
SELECT population_id, species, health_status FROM FishPopulationHealth WHERE disease_diagnosis IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM FishPopulationHealth ORDER BY species, population_size;
SELECT species, population_size, health_status FROM FishPopulationHealth WHERE average_weight BETWEEN 0.5 AND 1.0;
SELECT * FROM FishPopulationHealth WHERE population_id = 1
SELECT species, population_size FROM FishPopulationHealth WHERE health_status = 'Healthy' ORDER BY population_size DESC
SELECT species, population_size, average_weight FROM FishPopulationHealth WHERE disease_diagnosis IS NOT NULL AND average_weight > 5
SELECT DISTINCT species FROM FishPopulationHealth WHERE population_size BETWEEN 5000 AND 10000
SELECT CONCAT(species, ' - ', health_status) AS Species_Health FROM FishPopulationHealth ORDER BY species ASC
SELECT * FROM FishHealthRecord WHERE health_status='Good';
SELECT fish_species, disease FROM FishHealthRecord WHERE fish_species='Salmon';
SELECT * FROM WaterQualityRecord WHERE temperature > 25;
SELECT record_id, ph_level FROM WaterQualityRecord WHERE sample_date='2022-05-10';
SELECT * FROM FishHealthRecord ORDER BY fish_species DESC;
SELECT * FROM FishHealthRecord WHERE health_status = 'Good';
SELECT fish_species, health_status, disease FROM FishHealthRecord WHERE disease = 'Ichthyophthirius multifiliis';
SELECT fish_species, treatment_plan FROM FishHealthRecord WHERE fish_species = 'Goldfish' AND health_status = 'Poor';
SELECT * FROM WaterQualityRecord WHERE ammonia_level > 0.5 ORDER BY sample_date DESC;
SELECT record_id, sample_date, temperature FROM WaterQualityRecord WHERE temperature BETWEEN 25 AND 30 ORDER BY record_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM FishPopulations;
SELECT species, population_size FROM FishPopulations WHERE health_status IS NULL;
SELECT location, species FROM FishPopulations ORDER BY location DESC, species ASC;
SELECT * FROM DiseaseRecords WHERE record_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT treatment_date, treatment_type FROM TreatmentHistory WHERE treatment_success = true;
SELECT * FROM FishPopulations WHERE health_status = 'Good' ORDER BY species ASC, location DESC;
SELECT species, location, population_size FROM FishPopulations WHERE population_size > 1000 ORDER BY species DESC, population_size ASC;
SELECT species, location, COUNT(*) AS total_population FROM FishPopulations GROUP BY species, location HAVING total_population >= 5 ORDER BY total_population DESC;

SELECT f.species, d.disease_name, d.record_date, th.treatment_type FROM FishPopulations f JOIN DiseaseRecords d ON f.fish_id = d.fish_id JOIN TreatmentHistory th ON d.record_id = th.record_id WHERE th.treatment_success = TRUE ORDER BY d.record_date DESC, th.treatment_date DESC;

SELECT f.species, f.location, d.disease_name, d.record_date, th.treatment_type FROM FishPopulations f LEFT JOIN DiseaseRecords d ON f.fish_id = d.fish_id LEFT JOIN TreatmentHistory th ON d.record_id = th.record_id WHERE d.disease_name IS NOT NULL ORDER BY f.location ASC, d.record_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM FishSpecies
SELECT species_name, average_size FROM FishSpecies
SELECT species_name, habitat FROM FishSpecies ORDER BY habitat DESC
SELECT * FROM HealthRecords WHERE temperature > 25
SELECT species_name, total_population FROM FishSpecies JOIN PopulationStatistics ON FishSpecies.species_id = PopulationStatistics.species_id
SELECT * FROM FishSpecies;
SELECT species_name, habitat FROM FishSpecies ORDER BY species_name DESC;
SELECT species_id, species_name, average_size FROM FishSpecies WHERE average_size > 10;
SELECT * FROM HealthRecords WHERE temperature BETWEEN 20 AND 30;
SELECT species_name, total_population FROM FishSpecies JOIN PopulationStatistics ON FishSpecies.species_id = PopulationStatistics.species_id;
SELECT * FROM Fish_Populations;
SELECT species, health_status FROM Fish_Populations WHERE species = 'Salmon';
SELECT location FROM Fish_Populations ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT disease_name, symptoms FROM Diseases WHERE preventive_measures IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM Treatments WHERE treatment_description LIKE '%injection%';
SELECT * FROM Fish_Populations;
SELECT location, species FROM Fish_Populations WHERE health_status = 'Good';
SELECT treatment_name, treatment_description FROM Treatments WHERE disease_id IN (SELECT disease_id FROM Diseases WHERE disease_name = 'Infection');
SELECT fish_id, species, location, health_status FROM Fish_Populations ORDER BY health_status DESC, species ASC;
SELECT f.location, f.contact_person, f.contact_number, fp.species FROM Fisheries f JOIN Fish_Populations fp ON f.location = fp.location;
